title: 8 Essential Figma Buzz Tips Empower Designers to Craft Flexible Branded Templates for Marketing Teams

paragraphs.content: Figma's official blog details **8 tips for designers building branded templates in Figma Buzz**, focusing on self-serve designs that maintain brand integrity while allowing flexibility for non-designers.These guidelines emphasize tools like Auto Layout for responsive elements and separated text layers for Bulk Create compatibility, ensuring templates adapt to varied content without breaking layouts.Designers are urged to adopt a "marketing lens" so templates "bendâ€”but don't break" under real-world use, such as long headlines or swapped images.

sections.title: Leveraging Auto Layout and Modular Layers for Responsive Templates

paragraphs.content: Auto Layout forms the backbone of flexible templates by maintaining spacing for buttons, text, and images even with dynamic content changes.Separating text layers into unique inputs supports Bulk Create from CSV or XLSX files, mapping fields accurately to avoid formatting breaks.Figma Buzz's brand controls lock consistent elements like logos while allowing edits to body text or CTAs, indicated by pink outlines and lock icons.
